item.title: Report E-2023060652
item.description:
Report E-2023060652

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-17T15:10:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-22
  • City: ORANGEBURG
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: EAGLE TRANSPORT CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver reported a tank malfunction that resulted in a product release. However, video reviewed during investigation showed the driver moved the truck while making the delivery. Approximately 10 gallons of product spilled.
